org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy
Class AeUnpackedDeploymentStager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.AeUnpackedDeploymentStager
public class AeUnpackedDeploymentStager
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for deploying the bprs to the expanded working dir.
